songs.title: Heart by Heart
songs.album: The Mortal Instruments: City of Bones (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
When your soul finds the soul it was waiting for
When someone walks into your heart through an open door
When your hand finds the hand it was meant to hold
Don't let go

[Pre-Chorus 1]
Someone comes into your world
Suddenly, your world has changed forever

[Chorus]
No, there's no one else's eyes
That can see into me
No one else's arms can lift
Lift me up so high
Your love lifts me out of time
And you know my heart by heart
Whoa, whoa

[Verse 2]
When you're one with the one you were meant to find
Everything falls in place, all the stars align
When you're touched by the cloud that has touched your soul
Don't let go

[Pre-Chorus 2]
Someone comes into your life
It's like they've been in your life forever

[Chorus]
No, there's no one else's eyes
That can see into me
No one else's arms can lift
Lift me up so high
Your love lifts me out of time
And you know my heart by heart

[Bridge]
Somehow, we've found our way to find each other
Somehow, I found my way to you

[Breakdown]
No, there's no one else's eyes
That can see into me
No

[Chorus]
No, there's no one else's eyes
That can see into me
No one else's arms can lift
Lift me up so high
Your love lifts me out of time
And you know my heart by heart
Whoa, whoa

[Outro]
And you know my heart by heart
Whoa, whoa
And you know my heart by heart
And you know my heart by heart
